data.title: Jingtian & Gongcheng
data.meta_description: Discover where Jingtian & Gongcheng are ranked in the Greater China Region legal rankings. Visit Chambers and Partners to learn more.
data.text:
Chairman: Mr. Zhao Yang

Managing Partners: Mr. Zhao Yang, Mr. Wang Weiguo, Mr. Hu Zhengzheng, Mr. Li Da, Mr. Gao Xiang, Mr. Lang Yuanpeng, Mr. Chen Zejia

Number of partners: 180+

Number of legal professionals: 760+

Languages: Chinese, English, French, German, Japanese, Korean

Firm Overview:

Jingtian & Gongcheng is one of the first private and independent partnership law firms in China. Since its establishment, Jingtian & Gongcheng is by now widely recognised as one of the top full service law firms in China and commands leading positions in various practices. It has always been deeply committed to serving its clients and protecting their interests, and therefore has deep, practical experience in many “first-of-its-kind” deals and cases.Jingtian & Gongcheng has won many acclaim and numerous awards from leading legal publications.

Main Areas of Practice:

Capital Markets

Investment & M&A

Major Asset Restructuring

Dispute Resolution

PE/VC

Cross-border Investment

Banking & Finance

Asset Management

Structured Finance & Derivatives

Fund Formation

Tax

Real Estate & Construction

Intellectual Property

Insolvency

Employment & Labour

Cybersecurity & Data Privacy

Wealth Management

White Collar Criminal Defense

Technology, Media & Telecom

Healthcare

Education

Capital Markets:

In security offierings made by PRC companies on Chinese and international capital markets, the firm has been consistently ranked in Tier 1.

Investment & M&A:

The firm’s M&A team has been active on acquisitions by foreign and domestic investors, as well as takeover and reorganisation of listed companies.

Major Asset Restructuring:

The firm provides comprehensive and professional legal services to the major asset restructuring of large SOEs and private enterprises.

Dispute Resolution:

Its dispute resolution team is an industry leader in civil and commercial litigations,foreign-related dispute resolutions, as well as domestic and overseas commercial arbitration.

PE/VC:

The firm not only advises international and domestic PEs and VCs but also has accumulated invaluable experience in representing investee companies and entrepreneurs in PE and VC deals.

Cross-border Investment:

The firm provides a one-stop, full suite of comprehensive legal services to help Chinese companies successfully complete cross-border investments in foreign jurisdictions.

Banking & Finance:

The firm provides sophisticated services on syndicated and commercial loans, project financing, financing leases, securitisation, non-performing assets and derivatives.

Asset Management:

The firm's legal team has deep knowledge, understanding and rich practical experience with representing clients across all asset classes.

Structured Finance & Derivatives:

Jingtian & Gongcheng is one of the earliest law firms in China to provide legal services for asset securitization.

Fund Formation:

The firm's lawyers with deep experience advising fund sponsors and investors in structuring funds that are tailored to their specific objectives.

Tax:

The firm provides comprehensive and practical tax advice for domestic and international clients.

Real Estate & Construction:

The firm has one of the most experienced real estate teams in China to assist clients on development, management, financing, sale or lease of industrial, commercial or residential estates.

Intellectual Property:

The IP team is known for skills and expertise in protecting IP rights through administrative and judicial systems.

Insolvency:

The firm’s lawyers provide full legal services in consultation, transaction, collection and disposal of non-performing loans, distressed investments and other special situation investments for various clients.

Employment & Labour:

The firm advises clients on labour law issues and represents clients in labour disputes.

Cybersecurity & Data Privacy:

The firm's cybersecurity and data privacy team diligently serve their clients across multiple industries and sectors.

Wealth Management:

The firm advises clients on family and private wealth management law issues and represents clients in family lawsuit and dispute resolution.

White Collar Criminal Defence:

The firm has the practical experience, expertise and knowledge to successfully represent its clients.

Technology, Media & Telecom:

From the earliest IPO of China Mobile to the listing of internet companies, the firm has been at the forefront of this field.

Healthcare:

The firm leads the market in advising the healthcare industry and it has won clients in pharmaceutical, medical device, hospital and medical waste management sectors in listings, M&A and PE deals.

Education:

Jingtian & Gongcheng has a longstanding reputation in delivering commercial legal advice to the education industry.
